overview:
Applied Trading FZE

With a committed approach and progressive vision, we are a Sharjah based company engaged in the manufacturing, supply and export of surgical disposables, hospital equipment, hospital consumables and medical devices. Through the course of time, we have acquired intensive industrial expertise and market know-how to be used in our processes offering ultimate products and services to our clients. We are an ISO & CE certified company that offers only superior quality and zero-defect products catering to the needs of various big and small hospitals, nursing homes and other health care institutions. Generally, we accept bulk orders and assure timely delivery of all the products on time.

At Applied trading, quality is our specialty. Right from the very beginning, we have won unparalleled recognition due to our unmatched quality standards. Made of quality material, our hospital equipment and surgical products pass through stringent quality control checks and are made for the most demanding surgical requirements.

We manufacture, export and supply a variety of hospital and surgical equipment, such as - surgical face mask, anesthesia face mask, cardiothoracic surgery products, suction bags, disposable suction bags, control syringes, cuffed endotracheal tubes, introducer needles etc. Our product range includes:

Medical Devices
Hospital Equipment
Hospital Consumables
Surgical Disposables

Tel : +(971)-(6)-5575210
